properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 11 at 9:39AM CST until January 12 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Memphis TN
properties.description:
The National Weather Service has issued a Flood Warning for the
Loosahatchie River...S.F. of the Forked Deer River...Wolf River.

The National Weather Service in Memphis TN has issued a

* Flood Warning for
the Wolf River near Wolf River Near Rossville 1N
* from Saturday January 11 until Sunday January 12.
* At 09 AM Saturday the stage was...5.9 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Maximum forecast stage of 13.5 feet on Sunday January 12.
* Flood stage is 13.0 feet.
* Forecast to rise above flood stage by Saturday January 11 and
continue to rise to near 13.5 feet by Sunday January 12. The river
will fall below flood stage by Sunday January 12.
At 14.0 feet, Flood water begins to flow over Highways 196 and 205
and Houston Levee Road near the Wolf River. Morrison Creek at
Rossville will begin to backwater flood around the businesses near
the railroad tracks. Collierville-Arlington road is flooding or
flooded near the Wolf River Bridge. Residential areas near the river
in southeast Shelby County will begin to flood..
properties.instruction:
A followup Flood Statement will be issued Sunday or sooner if
conditions warrant.

For graphical river and flood information...please go to
www.weather.gov and click near Memphis on the map, then select Rivers
and Lakes.

Do not drive through flooded areas...turn around don't drown.

Stay tuned to your weather radio and your local news media for the
latest river information.
